definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: The influence of bound condition on the trend of foliation and high stress area.
sentences.chinese: 約束條件與層理分佈和應力集中區的關係。

sentences.english: The eolian dunes are mainly composed of medium and fine-grained sand, good in sorting and rich in bedding structure.
sentences.chinese: 沙丘以中細砂組成，分選極好，層理構造十分豐富。

sentences.english: The stratification of beach deposits has been studied particularly.
sentences.chinese: 對海灘沉積物的層理進行了着重研究。
